timestamp_format_m_desktop.description: Timestamp format string for displaying month and day (but not the year) of a date within the current year, ex: use 'MMM D' for 'Aug 8', or 'D MMM' for '8 Aug'

verified_desktop.description: Label shown next to icon for a verified contact

show_qr_invite_code_desktop.description: Button label for showing QR code for joining a verified group

initiate_key_transfer_desktop.message: An Autocrypt Setup Message securely shares your end-to-end setup with other Autocrypt-compliant apps. The setup will be encrypted by a setup code which is displayed here and must be typed on the other device.

autocrypt_asm_click_body.message: This is the Autocrypt Setup Message used to transfer your end-to-end setup between clients.\n\nTo decrypt and use your setup, tap or click on this message.

pref_backup_export_explain.message: A backup helps you to set up a new installation on this or on another device.\n\nThe backup will contain all messages, contacts and chats and your end-to-end Autocrypt setup. Keep the backup file in a safe place or delete it as soon as possible.

autocrypt_continue_transfer_please_enter.message: Please enter the setup code that is displayed on the other device.

show_key_transfer_message_desktop.message: Your key has been sent to yourself. Switch to the other device and open the setup message. You should be prompted for a setup code. Type the following digits into the prompt. Once you're done, your other device will be ready to use Autocrypt.

ask_block_contact.message: Block this contact? You will no longer receive messages from this contact.

ask_unblock_contact.message: Unblock this contact? You will once again be able to receive messages from this contact.

autocrypt_incorrect_desktop.message: Incorrect setup code. Please try again.

ask_delete_chat_desktop.message: Are you sure you want to delete this chat?

ask_leave_group.message: Are you sure you want to leave this group?

forget_login_confirmation_desktop.message: Delete this login? Everything will be deleted, including your end-to-end setup, contacts, chats, messages and media. This action is final and can not be reversed.
